version_description:
We've been adding in more of the features you have been requesting:

* You now have the ability to add custom habits!
* You can now change savings type to time instead of money.
* You can now search through AA meetings for the New York and Seattle areas.
* We will be adding meetings for other locations soon!
* You can add meetings to your Calendar or get directions via Maps.
* Some misc bug fixes.

We appreciate your feedback - send your thoughts our way at support@iamsoberapp.com.

This includes some improvements to our notification system along with some bug fixes. We have some stuff in the works that we're excited to share with you! Stay tuned.

In this release, we are introducing a new feature called Daily Pledges. Staying sober means you take things one day at a time. Now every day you can make a pledge to stay sober and track those pledges.

* Set a time to get a daily reminder to make your pledge.
* Set up a reason you want to stay sober and look at that reason every day!
* Track your pledges on a calendar screen.
* Track your pledge streaks.

We also updated the app for iPhone X, and added a few more currencies to the savings list.

We have much more in the works, as always please send us your feedback at support@iamsoberapp.com.

Pledge reviews are here! Now you can follow up on your pledges at the end of every day:

* Rate the difficulty of staying sober today
* Identify triggers, things that made your day easier or harder
* Take notes to remember how you got through impossible days as well as what made good days so good
* Retroactively mark days you stuck to your pledge

We also included a few bug fixes and performance improvements. We're excited to get your feedback around reviews. Thanks for your support!

In this release, we are really excited to bring you some additional motivational packs. These will be packs of motivational messages that include:

* Aphorisms
* Exercises
* Affirmations
* Quotes
* Verses

Each pack will be offered as an in-app purchase and will contain 30 days of messages. You'll still be able to get The Sober Start pack for free which also has 30 days of messages.

We have more packs in store, but as always we'd love to hear your feedback at support@iamsoberapp.com. Thanks!

This release includes:

- Performance updates that improve responsiveness of the app.
- Updated the main Addictions screen to have a new look that includes multiple types of counters.
- Added the ability to track both money and time for savings.
- Also added the ability to track time as minutes instead of hours.
- Bumped up the character limit for reasons to stay sober from 95 characters to 280 characters.
- Updates to our navigation and carousel components.
- Brought activities up a level to the main Pledge settings screen so you can edit your activities from there.
- A few bug fixes, graphic improvements, and misc code cleanup.

With this release, we're excited to introduce Sober Milestone Stories!

Now when you reach a milestone, you can share your story of what your experience was like reaching that milestone. Sharing your story can help encourage others who are approaching that milestone. You can provide them with insights about what you learned along the way, and what to expect.

Also included:
- To submit a story, you can now create an account and set a profile picture.
- Ability to see (and change) your start date from the main counter screen now.
- Quite a few bug fixes and UI improvements.

Review flow improvements!

We've made some improvements to the daily review flow including:
- Added the ability to record and track moods.
- A separate notes screen is now at the end of the review flow.
- If you haven't pledged yet and it's time to review, just show the review button instead.
- Fixes for errors that were occurring for some users.

Other updates include:
- Updated the Pledges calendar view to indicate sobriety and start date resets.
- Pledge stats now show up to 10 activities for each difficulty and added moods here as well.
- Much improved reset/relapse experience.
- Small UI improvements to stories.
- Various bug fixes.

Thanks for all of your feedback from the previous releases - we heard you! This release includes many pledge fixes and improvements.

Fixes:
- Fix for the case when reviewing your day was wiping out your pledge from the morning and vice versa.
- Fix for calendar when tapping on dates from previous month.
- If you show up at the end of the day and you haven't pledged yet, still show the pledge button as well.

Improvements to the main pledges list screen:
- Brought mood emoji faces back in the main day box.
- Clearly indicate which days you didn't stay sober with black backgrounds.
- Moved difficulty indicators next to the day text and made smaller.

Improvements to the pledges calendar screen:
- Moved back to the calendar being highlighted in one row, and clearly indicate which days you didn't stay sober (lapsed days or start dates).
- To simplify the calendar, we created two separate modes for viewing your addiction sobriety and viewing your pledge streak.

Other improvements:
- Bumped up the max length for daily notes.
- Added self-harm and eating disorders to the main addictions list.
- More misc fixes and UI tweaks.

As always, let us know what you think at support@iamsoberapp.com and keep that sober train rolling!

With this release, we are introducing a set of Sober Plus features. You can continue to use the app for free, but a Sober Plus subscription will support our development and provide you with some extra functionality.

What's included:
- Locked access to keep your tracking private
- Night mode skin for ideal night-time viewing
- Access to all of our motivation packs
- Track up to 10 addictions
- Get a subscriber badge on your stories

Thanks for all of your feedback, we hope you enjoy!

Safety has always been a primary concern for our community. Before we decided to add commenting on stories, we wanted to make sure of a couple of things:

2. We still kept safety in the forefront.

If you see an abusive comment, you can report it. Even if it it's not on your story. Our community is very supportive and awesome and we hope you'll help us keep it this way.

We also added a Community tab. Now you can view stories from milestones and addictions besides your own.

We hope you dig it, and we have plans to make our community even better. Please keep your feedback coming!

This release includes some addiction and community reorganization!

We've reorganized our addiction taxonomy and added some new addictions (based on your suggestions) to help create better communities.

Changes include:

- A new BFRB community for skin picking, hair pulling, and nail biting.
- New addictions for adderall, vaping, masturbation, energy drinks, and fentanyl.
- Pulled junk food out of the eating disorder category (as that didn't really make sense) and made it a top-level community that include addictions like sugar and sweets.

Another community change you might notice is that you'll now have a Following feed. This is a new feed of stories, just from the people you're following.

Another improvement included is better notifications to keep you informed of what's happening.

You'll now be able to receive a notification when someone you follow posts a new story, or someone else comments in a thread that you also commented in. Story creators will also get notified when people react to their story, or when they get a new follower.

We've always been sensitive to the fact that notifications can quickly become noisy and annoying. We've done our best to try and make them as useful as possible. You can also customize exactly which notifications you'd like to receive in your settings.

We have so many more exciting things that we're working on and we can't wait to show you! Please keep your feedback coming to support@iamsober.com.
